Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33460 affecting package yajl for versions less than 2.1.0-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-33460 affecting package yajl for versions less than 2.1.0-19. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package yajl is earlier than 2.1.0-19, affected by CVE-2023-33460
